about_the_game:
Eating feet is a mystery game about the Republic of China.

During the Republic of China, with the popularity of Mr. Sai, many people of insight issued statements against God and Buddha.

"Superstition is an obstacle to evolution, and theocracy is the policy of fools."

"Begging for spirits in clay sculptures and wood carvings will make the world laugh, and it will be difficult to compete with the great powers."

Under the pressure of all parties, the national government carried out activities to destroy shrines, requiring all places to cancel burning incense, kneeling, Ming Qiang, sacrifice li, banning incense to the mountain, the establishment of Taoist temples and other bad customs.

This story takes place here, the protagonist's grandmother died, the cause of death is unclear.

Friend gouwa told him that grandma was eaten by the goblin.

What goblin?

huangpozi，she live in the mountains, my grandpa said that the gods have been beaten away, demons and ghosts will come out to make trouble."

"The huangpozi is one of them. She loves to eat children's feet."

...

...

"White tender little feet, smell sweet, lick a mouthful, ha ha ha, delicious, too delicious, reluctant to eat, but the heart and itching badly, how to do, who can tell me how to do!!"

Gameplay introduction

There are more than 10 different endings, each time to make a choice, is a thrilling challenge.

Players in the first four acts to play the son, the last four acts to play the mother。

 two character lines tell the same story, in different perspectives, to experience the unknown danger,。

The suspenseful atmosphere sets off the tight plot, which makes people feel like returning to that period of the Republic of China，but also in their own heart, how to choose is the most correct?

content_descriptors.notes: There is only mild violence, appearing in certain scenes, and the interrogation of human nature and the reflection of life, and there is no frequent violence and blood

name: 吃脚

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10 & Win11
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The mystery puzzle visual novel of the Republic of China - Grandma died, the coffin is placed in the funeral hall. My mother asked me to come to the vigil and repeatedly warned me not to open the coffin.
